About Me

Hello, my name is Bjorn Walker, and I work as a full-stack software engineer
specializing in Python and MERN stack development.

Hello, welcome to my page, and thank you for visiting. As stated above I currently work as a full-stack software enginneer in Atlanta, GA. I have a passion for technology, and I love learning about the various technologies that are developing throughout the world. While my main focus is in Python and MERN stack development, I also have an interest in Deep Learning, Neural Network, Robotics, and AR/VR.

When I am not developing new software, you can either find me planning out my next travel destination or exploring the beauty of nature. If you have an interest in contacting me regarding a possible job opportunity or a project collaboration, feel free to email me at bjornwalker12@gmail.com or message me on LinkedIn which is linked below in my socials.
